meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Elliot Shteir Susan Schubert Aaron Klein Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2525.

div.div:
1995 Seniors Tournament final game 2.
Last game of Season 11.

td.p: Elliot Shteir, an attorney from Somerville, New Jersey (subtotal of $4,400)
Susan Schubert, a retired teacher from Phoenix, Arizona (subtotal of $3,200)
Aaron Klein, a religious school director from Des Plaines, Illinois (subtotal of $6,400)

tr.td: DOGS
MGM MUSICALS
FIRST LADIES
MEDICINE
STATE CAPITALS
5-LETTER WORDS

(Alex: Each correct response will begin with those two letters of the alphabet, in that order, A-E.)
